title: Countryside Lodge Luxury with Exquisite Fine Dining & Wine
description: Escape the city for serene lodge luxury and world-class farm-to-plate dining at Nimbo Fork. Relax and unwind riverside in the foothills of the Snowy Mountains, in one of the most beautiful countryside destinations in NSW - just an hour from Wagga Wagga, a two-hour drive from Canberra or a four-hour drive from Sydney. Your escape includes daily country-style breakfast, an AU$50 credit to spend in the lodge’s fine dining restaurant, a bottle of wine and a complimentary cheeseboard, guaranteed late checkout at midday and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Countryside Lodge Luxury with Exquisite Dining & Drinks
description: Escape the city for serene lodge luxury and world-class dining at Nimbo Fork. Relax and unwind riverside in the foothills of the Snowy Mountains, in one of the most beautiful countryside destinations in NSW - just an hour from Wagga Wagga, a two-hour drive from Canberra or a four-hour drive from Sydney. Your escape includes daily country-style breakfast, two AU$25 credits to spend in the lodge’s fine dining restaurant, a drink per person and a complimentary cheeseboard, and a guaranteed 11am late checkout.
